UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Correlation between the activities of alpha-helical antimicrobial peptides and hydrophobicities represented as RP HPLC retention times.
Literature.Author: Kim S, Kim SS, Lee BJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=11µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=18µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=6µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=50µg/ml)
